name: Orbis - Galaxy Circles
description:
Orbis - not just a word, it's a game now!
It's easy gameplay and simple design makes it totally addictive and the perfect companion for those spare minutes.
On the train, in line at the bank or at school, being bored is now a thing of the past.
Fight your way up the highscore list and become the new Orbis king.

You like Orbis? Rate it, leave a review and look forward to even more exciting games from Forstech in the near future.

Found a bug or got some advice?
Let us know and we'll be on it right away!
